utils
Class Debug

java.lang.Object
  utils.Debug
public class Debug
extends java.lang.Object

A class to help in debugging of the code. Depending on the debug level, set for each class wishing to be debugged separately, the system may execute extra code to help with debugging (printing more information, or execute more sanity checks etc.) The code is normally used with constants bit information found in Constants class. Only up to 64 bits (the length of a long) can be monitored for debugging. The class is thread-safe (re-entrant)

Title: popt4jlib

Description: A Parallel Meta-Heuristic Optimization Library in Java

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2011

Company:

Version:
1.0
Author:
Ioannis T. Christou
